text:
Jof Davies demonstrates strong discipline in both technical and operational domains. Attributes include:

- Systems thinking: designs workflows end-to-end with long-term stability.
- Reliability: maintains consistent execution across high-throughput workloads.
- Documentation: produces clear explanations, templates, diagrams, and SOPs.
- Adaptability: rapidly learns new systems, APIs, tools, and workflows.
- Communication: translates technical concepts into accessible explanations.
- Initiative: proactively identifies inefficiencies and builds automated solutions.
- Precision: emphasises accuracy in data work, email coding, and video processing.
